definition: to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)

sentences.english: One trainee persuaded a farmer to lend him his light truck, so he could get cigarettes.
sentences.chinese: 有一位受训者试图向一位农民借他的轻型卡车去买烟。

sentences.english: The trainees submitted their monographs in time.
sentences.chinese: 受训者们及时提交了他们的专题论文。

sentences.english: Even the light punishment criminal may also receive training the generation to be imprisoned.
sentences.chinese: 甚至轻刑罪犯也可以受训代受坐牢。

sentences.english: A cormorant can catch 15kg of fish a day, but only after three to five years of training.
sentences.chinese: 一只受训三到五年的鸬鹚一天可捉到15公斤鱼。

sentences.english: He was ordered to report for training to the artillery officers' school.
sentences.chinese: 他被命令去炮兵军官学校报到受训。

sentences.english: Lai is an alumni of Hong Kong Wine Academy.
sentences.chinese: 黎先生受训于香港葡萄酒学院。

sentences.english: The trainee foxed the arrogant instructor with a knotty problem.
sentences.chinese: 那位受训的队员故意用难题把傲慢的教练搞糊涂。

sentences.english: Mindy learned to be an astronaut while working at NASA.
sentences.chinese: 明帝在太空总署受训成为太空人。

sentences.english: The trainer is training the trainees how to drive a train.
sentences.chinese: 教练员正在教受训者怎样开火车。

sentences.english: To provide educational facilities for the Maha Sangha and the laymen .
sentences.chinese: 提供僧团与在家居士受训的设施。

sentences.english: The picture shows the unit's liaison officers being trained in Ceylon.
sentences.chinese: 图为该部队联络官在锡兰基地受训时合影。

sentences.english: Results There were 5 cases of conversion to on-pump surgery in the Training Group.
sentences.chinese: 结果受训组中有5例中转体外循环手术。

sentences.english: Firuza was trained at the Tadzhik University.
sentences.chinese: 福鲁莎是在塔吉克大学受训的。

sentences.english: Is there any discounts if it is done by a trainee?
sentences.chinese: 要是一个受训者剪我发，可以打折吗？

sentences.english: Ukarammad is among its very first batch of detainees to be released following training.
sentences.chinese: 沃卡爱默德是第一批受训结束后被释放的学员之一。

sentences.english: Those who will go abroad for training next year will start learning English tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 那些明年出国受训的人员，将从明天开始学习外语。

definition: to drill troops/to build up and train
